languages.text: {n}Бросив на вас встревоженный взгляд, Паскаль с сомнением произносит на готическом языке:{/n} "В случае добровольной сдачи в плен я готов смягчить кару с немедленного уничтожения до ареста и изоляции. С целью полного допроса".

{n}Pasqal glances at you with worry and says in Gothic, his voice doubtful,{/n} "Following a voluntary surrender, I will be willing to commute the punishment from immediate destruction to arrest and isolation. For the purposes of conducting an exhaustive interrogation."
languages.original_text: {n}Бросив на вас встревоженный взгляд, Паскаль с сомнением произносит на готическом языке:{/n} "В случае добровольной сдачи в плен я готов смягчить кару с немедленного уничтожения до ареста и изоляции. С целью полного допроса".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal glances at you with worry and says in Gothic, his voice doubtful,{/n} "Following a voluntary surrender, I will be willing to commute the punishment from immediate destruction to arrest and isolation. For the sake of exhaustive interrogation."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルは心配そうにあなたを見ると、帝国語を使って疑い深い声音で言う。{/n}「自ら降伏すれば、処罰を即時破壊から逮捕隔離に減刑することも厭いません。徹底的な尋問を行うために」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal glances at you with worry and says in Gothic, his voice doubtful,{/n} "Following a voluntary surrender, I will be willing to commute the punishment from immediate destruction to arrest and isolation. For the purposes of conducting an exhaustive interrogation."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは心配そうにあなたを見ると、帝国語を使って疑い深い声音で言う。{/n}「自ら降伏すれば、処罰を即時破壊から逮捕隔離に減刑することも厭いません。徹底的な尋問を行うために」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡忧虑地看了你一眼，以低哥特语开了口，语气中充满了怀疑态度。{/n}“如果你自愿投降的话，我愿意将你的惩罚从‘立刻毁灭’改为‘逮捕隔离’，对你进行彻底审讯。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal glances at you with worry and says in Gothic, his voice doubtful,{/n} "Following a voluntary surrender, I will be willing to commute the punishment from immediate destruction to arrest and isolation. For the purposes of conducting an exhaustive interrogation."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡忧虑地看了你一眼，以低哥特语开了口，语气中充满了怀疑态度。{/n}“如果你自愿投降的话，我愿意将你的惩罚从‘立刻毁灭’改为‘逮捕隔离’，对你进行彻底审讯。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal sieht dich besorgt an und sagt mit zweifelnder Stimme auf Gotisch:{/n} "Nach einer freiwilligen Kapitulation wäre ich bereit, die Strafe von sofortiger Zerstörung zu Isolationshaft umzuwandeln. Zum Zwecke der Durchführung eines umfangreichen Verhörs."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal glances at you with worry and says in Gothic, his voice doubtful,{/n} "Following a voluntary surrender, I will be willing to commute the punishment from immediate destruction to arrest and isolation. For the purposes of conducting an exhaustive interrogation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal sieht dich besorgt an und sagt mit zweifelnder Stimme auf Gotisch:{/n} "Nach einer freiwilligen Kapitulation wäre ich bereit, die Strafe von sofortiger Zerstörung zu Isolationshaft umzuwandeln. Zum Zweck eines umfassenden Verhörs."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal vous adresse un regard inquiet et s'exprime en langue gothique, d'une voix empreinte de doute :{/n} « En cas de reddition volontaire, je serais prêt à commuer sa destruction immédiate en une peine d'isolement carcéral. Ainsi, nous aurions le temps de procéder à un interrogatoire exhaustif. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal glances at you with worry and says in Gothic, his voice doubtful,{/n} "Following a voluntary surrender, I will be willing to commute the punishment from immediate destruction to arrest and isolation. For the purposes of conducting an exhaustive interrogation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal vous adresse un regard inquiet et s'exprime en langue gothique, d'une voix empreinte de doute :{/n} « En cas de reddition volontaire, je serais prêt à commuer sa destruction immédiate en une peine d'isolement carcéral. Ainsi, nous aurions le temps de procéder à un interrogatoire exhaustif. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal te lanza una mirada de preocupación y habla en gótico; notas la duda en su voz.{/n} «A tenor de una rendición voluntaria, estaré dispuesto a conmutar la pena de destrucción inmediata por otra de detención y confinamiento. Para poder efectuar un interrogatorio exhaustivo».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal glances at you with worry and says in Gothic, his voice doubtful,{/n} "Following a voluntary surrender, I will be willing to commute the punishment from immediate destruction to arrest and isolation. For the purposes of conducting an exhaustive interrogation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal te lanza una mirada de preocupación y habla en gótico; notas la duda en su voz.{/n} «A tenor de una rendición voluntaria, estaré dispuesto a conmutar la pena de destrucción inmediata por otra de detención y confinamiento. Para poder efectuar un interrogatorio exhaustivo».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sana endişeyle bakan Pasqal, kuşkuyla Gotik dilinde konuşuyor.{/n} "Gönüllü teslimiyet durumunda, derhâl imha cezasını tutuklanma ve tecrit edilme ile değiştirme düşüncesindeyim. Böylelikle teferruatlı bir sorgu gerçekleştirilebilir."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal glances at you with worry and says in Gothic, his voice doubtful,{/n} "Following a voluntary surrender, I will be willing to commute the punishment from immediate destruction to arrest and isolation. For the purposes of conducting an exhaustive interrogation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal sana endişeyle bakıyor ve kuşkulu bir sesle, Gotik kullanarak konuşuyor:{/n} "Gönüllü teslimiyeti hesaba katarak, derhâl yok edilme cezasını, tutuklanma ve tecrit edilme ile değiştirme fikrindeyim. Teferruatlı bir sorgu gerçekleştirmek amacıyla."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
